channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: ‚ñì‚ñì‚ñì‚ñì‚ñì‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë 30%
üé∂ ‚ÄúJust a dream and the wind to carry me / Soon I will be free‚Äù üé∂ https://t.co/hmjcndJOW5
Even more Solar Ash. https://t.co/1tNzZsUbx4
Lots of twentysomethings out tonight, waiting in line in sub-freezing temperatures to get into nightclubs. Attractive People‚Ñ¢ in Toronto sure do think that the pandemic is over, don‚Äôt they?
@Sean_YYZ Hey @lemonodor, is there anything you can add here? Are there any bots that are tracking planes circling in that part of the world?

Twitter‚Äôs definitely an afterthought for use in promoting a lot of things that I‚Äôm interested in. An art festival that I‚Äôm extremely fond of didn‚Äôt tweet that was happening again this year, much less that it‚Äôs on right now.
The engagement I get from using Twitter for my nonprofit organizations is lower than, say, Instagram. We get more faves there. Way, way more. https://t.co/IgAs7GHXZR
I see now that the art festival is posting to Instagram about its 2022 exhibition and, sigh, that‚Äôs just now how I want to get my news about local events.
@geerlingguy There‚Äôs not much that‚Äôs predictable in the world, but that‚Äôs one thing that is.
In my dream world, we would open conversations with strangers with ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs life like for you?‚Äù https://t.co/Rm4wtJBwPd
I regret not buying stock in Icelandic vodka companies. In related news: I‚Äôm selling my unopened 750 ml bottle of @ReykaVodka for $100! https://t.co/8PYKK9kCof
@JodiesJumpsuit I would have crawled over my own mother to do just that.

I think about this tweet a lot. Doors Open Toronto is one of the city‚Äôs best events, and it would have been wild to have vaccination centres in its great buildings. (You can read about Doors Open Toronto in my forthcoming book, Toronto: The Good Parts.) https://t.co/0Z12U18xuO
Studying the Canada Wheat Board in university was how I learned the word ‚Äúmonopsony‚Äù (I forgot everything else I learned about the CWB). https://t.co/bMORC6xWou
@geerlingguy We have come full circle where space launches are boring again. https://t.co/S44QYrlKth
@sigurros I‚Äôll be at the Toronto show! @TOLiveTweets
I‚Äôll be at the Toronto show! https://t.co/OPyGB09RsP
@justagwailo And Sarah Chan!
500 days! https://t.co/8uIRc2FWvU

Oops, I had placed my bet on the ‚ÄúThe Emergencies Act would be in effect for more than two weeks‚Äù square. https://t.co/ko1aZYsNFd
Don‚Äôt worry, I‚Äôve already started stress-eating in anticipation of every side of the debate saying ‚ÄúI told you so!‚Äù

I bet the Russian ministers synced their watches and Putin changed the time on his watch so that the people on Twitter who zoom in on everything would come to the erroneous conclusion that the meeting was pre-recorded. https://t.co/q3rzOEVb5o

@nsylianteng I work at the same time as a group of people in India, so I cobbled together a bash script, invoked by TextExpander. I just type ;time and it asks me for a time in 24-hour format, and it converts that for our whole team. My hands never leave the keyboard. https://t.co/nAi3rpWALb
A new office tower? With a virus out there that kills everybody on impact? https://t.co/wfg7rCwySV

Revue Cinema again comes through and honours the assumptions of ticketholders who bought their tickets under a different regulatory requirement (which ends soon, a month before April 4th). https://t.co/WjtwKa1gYi
@dailysimpsons Fox produced a mockumentary called Springfield of Dreams: The Legend of Homer Simpson in 2017. It‚Äôs funny to me that George F. Will agreed to take part in it. https://t.co/hTWqH8VTm2

@Kimli This whole area has had police checkpoints at every block around this area, this weekend and last weekend and the weekend before that. There was a somewhat major ‚Äúprotest‚Äù on the first weekend, but downtown around Queen‚Äôs Park was local, emergency or foot traffic only. https://t.co/WTZfFWW8tu
Is there a Twitter account, like @AP_Planner (or @CanadaPlanner, which I maintain), that gives us a heads up on days with numbers like this? https://t.co/Ropw3hLndO
